dcterms:creator: B. Mildenhall
P. P. Srinivasan
R. Ortiz-Cayon
N. Khademi Kalantari
R. Ramamoorthi

dcterms:description: A dataset used for simulating underwater scenes, specifically the Fern scene, to evaluate the performance of the SeaThru-NeRF method.
dcterms:title: LLFF dataset

dcterms:creator: D. Akkaynak
T. Treibitz
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a method for removing water from underwater images, which is utilized in the SeaThru-NeRF framework for rendering clear views of underwater scenes.
dcterms:title: SeaThru dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Venkatramanan Sethuraman
M. Srinivasan Ramanagopal
K. A. Skinner
dcterms:description: A dataset that focuses on neural radiance fields specifically for underwater scenes, used to demonstrate the capabilities of the SeaThru-NeRF method.
dcterms:title: WaterNeRF dataset

dcterms:description: Real-world underwater scenes captured from the Red Sea, Caribbean Sea, and Pacific Sea, used to evaluate the performance of the SeaThru-NeRF method.
dcterms:title: Real-world underwater scenes
